org.apache.samoa.learners.classifiers

Interface LocalLearner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NaiveBayes, SimpleClassifierAdapter

    public interface LocalLearner
extends Serializable
    Learner interface for non-distributed learners.
    Author:
    abifet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalLearner create()
      Creates a new learner object.
      double[] getVotesForInstance(Instance inst)
      Predicts the class memberships for a given instance.
      void resetLearning()
      Resets this classifier.

      Deprecated. 
      void trainOnInstance(Instance inst)
      Trains this classifier incrementally using the given instance.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        LocalLearner create()
        Creates a new learner object.
        Returns:
        the learner

      • getVotesForInstance

        double[] getVotesForInstance(Instance inst)
        Predicts the class memberships for a given instance. If an instance is unclassified, the returned array elements must be all zero.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be classified
        Returns:
        an array containing the estimated membership probabilities of the test instance in each class

      • resetLearning

        void resetLearning()
        Resets this classifier. It must be similar to starting a new classifier from scratch.

      • trainOnInstance

        void trainOnInstance(Instance inst)
        Trains this classifier incrementally using the given instance.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be used for training

      • setDataset

        @Deprecated
void setDataset(Instances dataset)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets where to obtain the information of attributes of Instances
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset that contains the information
